title: Emerald Blossom Jhumka - Pachala Ratnala Gundelu
materials: Oval Cut Emerald (estimated 3 carats) with good clarity
features: Elaborate floral top with an oval-cut emerald as the centerpiece. The floral design is intricately detailed with CZ accents. The Jhumka base features an openwork design, a modern take on traditional filigree. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of elegance. Features a secure screw-back closure (press-back alternative available).
occasions: or traditional festivities such as Ugadi
and Varalakshmi Vratham. Also suitable for contemporary parties and celebrations.
description: This Jhumka seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The eye-catching emerald adds a pop of color and makes a bold statement. The high-quality 22K gold ensures lasting value. The craftsmanship reflects Hyderabad's rich jewelry-making heritage. Lightweight design allows for comfortable wear even for extended periods.
